Orochimaru jumps into the air above his target and releases from his sleeves several snakes that fall down at the opponent attacking them. He then lands and finishes with attacking the opponent with the [[Sword of Kusanagi (Orochimaru)|Sword of Kusanagi]].

[[es:Ataque de Serpientes Voladoras]]
[[pl:Atak Nurkującego Węża]]
